content.question: Which of the following occurred during Radical Reconstruction?

choices.label: The passage of the Black Codes
A permanent shift of Southern voters to the Republican Party
The creation of a new industrial base in a majority of Southern states
The formation of the Ku Klux Klan
Widespread redistribution of confiscated land to former slaves

content.answer: The formation of the Ku Klux Klan

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
